TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi DataGridCellsPanel extends System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel

Docs.summary: Represents a panel that lays out cells and column headers in a data grid.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellsPanel> is used as the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsPanel%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DataGridCellsPresenter> to lay out cells in a row. It is used as the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsPanel%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DataGridColumnHeadersPresenter> to lay out column headers. The panel arranges cells horizontally and uses each cell's column information to determine the correct size for each cell.
